lac.algorithms.adt

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • lac.algorithms.Config
      • lac.algorithms.adt.Config

  • public class Config
extends Config
    Configuration used for ADT algorithms. It includes two different measures. First, confidence is taken into account to obtain rules. Then, merit is used to remove those rules which missclassify many instances
